name: Fix or Dead - Global Game Jam 2020
name_original: Fix or Dead - Global Game Jam 2020
description:
[ This game is participating in Global Game Jam 2020  independently. ]

A nuclear missile will be launched in 120 seconds! Fix the launch button to stop the missile, or elevator to evacuate to the underground bunker before it's too late! Fix or Dead is a simple platformer game that made with Unity, and by two creators. 

The president pressed the nuclear launch button accidentally. Your goal is gathering repairing tools, which are located somewhere in the building. 

There are four endings. Please enjoy our the game. 

Thank you.
